name: Al Maani'
description: Al Maani' is one of the names of Allah in Islam, meaning 'The Withholder' or 'The Preventer'.
summary: This name reflects the divine attribute of Allah who controls and restrains that which is harmful or unnecessary for His creation. It highlights the concept that Allah has the authority to grant or withhold benefits and blessings, emphasizing His wisdom and sovereignty over all matters.
